caption.p: Transwell migration and invasion assays. (A) Transwell migration, and (B) invasion assays were conducted in the CPSF1 knockdown or CPSF1 overexpression groups to determine the effect of CPSF1 on cell invasion and analyzed using Student’s t-test. Statistical data are presented as the mean ± SD. * P < 0.05 and ** P < 0.01.
